Class InTransactionWorkQueueSynchronization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.InTransactionWorkQueueSynchronization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Synchronization, WorkQueueSynchronization

    public class InTransactionWorkQueueSynchronization
extends Object
implements WorkQueueSynchronization
    Execute final work inside a transaction.

    Emmanuel Bernard
